item.description:
Enjoy a fun, easy to moderate level hike through the beautiful trails of Upton State Forest.

We'll hike for 1.5 hours to 2 hours then go out for lunch afterwards.

Please bring water on the hike with you.
Dogs are allowed on a leash and poop needs to be scooped.

Meet in the parking lot by the entrance to the trail.

This park is located near the Westboro/Upton town line.

Click here for more info on the park and directions...

Carpool from Panera's at 10:30 am
Since we have a big group and the parking lot is small, please meet at the Panera's parking lot to carpool to the park. You do not have to, but if you can, that would be great.

After the hike we will head right back to the lot and have lunch at Panera's.

Panera's - 600 Union Street, Westborough, MA - located at the Bay State Commons (off Route 30 near Westboro Center) Approximately 5 miles from park
MEET IN THE LOT IN BACK OF PANERA'S FACING ROCHE BROS. Look for my maroon CRV Honda with the rose on the back.
item.name: Hike Upton State Forest
